ARABIC: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'This Messenger, who has been sent to you, is mad.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (The Pharaoh) said (to his nobles): "Your apostle who has been sent to you, is certainly mad."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said to the audience: "This Messenger of yours who has been sent to you is simply mad."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh said, "The Messengers who has been sent to you is certainly insane".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “This (Noble) Messenger of yours, who has been sent towards you, has no intelligence!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Fir`awn) said: "Verily, your Messenger who has been sent to you is a madman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Said he: Most surely your Apostle who is sent to you is mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Surely your Messenger who was sent to you is possessed!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said: Lo! your messenger who hath been sent unto you is indeed a madman!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh said, "This messenger who has been sent to you is surely possessed!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Fir'awn said: verily your apostle who hath been sent unto you is mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed your messenger, who has been sent to you, is surely crazy!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said: "Truly your messenger who has been sent to you is a veritable madman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "Verily, your Messenger who has been sent to you is a madman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Pharaoh) said: 'Surely, the Messenger who has been sent to you is mad!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “This messenger of yours, who is sent to you, is crazy.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "Indeed, your 'messenger' who has been sent to you is mad."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:27] He said, ‘Verily this messenger of yours sent to you is a madman!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Pharaoh) said: Lo! your messenger who hath been sent unto you is indeed a madman!) They said: who is this that you are calling us to? And who is this Lord of ours who is also the Lord of our fathers, Moses?
